item.title: Report X-2023082084
item.description:
Report X-2023082084

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-16T00:33:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-29
  • City: ELKO
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNION PACIFIC RAILROAD COMPANY
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: CBTX 734834 was found releasing in the UPRR Elko yard, after inspection it was found eight manway swing bolts were less than tool tight resulting in the release of approximately one gallon of Diesel Fuel. The manway was secured, tank car wiped down and the car went back in transportation.
